text: Modoc County is a county in the far northeast corner of the U.S. state of California. As of the 2020 census, the population was 8,700, making it the third-least populous county in California. The county seat and only incorporated city is Alturas. Previous county seats include Lake City and Centerville; the latter is now a ghost town. The county borders Nevada and Oregon. == References == Category:1874 establishments in California
title: Modoc County, California
